sentences.sContent: I suppose further that you need a precis of the idea so you can decide whether the suggestion is feasible and warrants more exploration.
sentences.sContent_eng: I suppose further that you need a precis of the idea so you can decide whether the suggestion is feasible and warrants more exploration.
sentences.sCn: 我进一步假设您需要有一个大致的想法，以使得您可以决定那个建议是否切实 可行而且确保深入的研究。
